title: Code Review
content: Please review this code for bugs, performance issues, and best practices. Suggest improvements and explain your reasoning.

title: Explain Simply
content: Explain the following concept in simple terms that a beginner could understand. Use analogies where helpful.

title: Debug Helper
content: I'm encountering an error. Please help me debug this issue. Here's the error message and relevant code:

title: Refactor Request
content: Please refactor this code to be more readable, maintainable, and following SOLID principles:

title: Documentation
content: Please generate comprehensive documentation for the following code, including purpose, parameters, return values, and usage examples:

title: Test Cases
content: Please generate unit test cases for the following code. Cover edge cases, error conditions, and typical usage:
